sentences.english: She re married her former husband ten year after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她与原来的丈夫离婚十年后又复婚了。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten years after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她与前夫离婚十年后又复婚了。

sentences.english: He also will not tell you remarry ?
After the divorce to remarry is in the life most unforgivable stupid mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 离婚后复婚是人生中最不可原谅的愚蠢错误。

sentences.english: The vast majority of people who remarry live with their partner first.
sentences.chinese: 大多数人还是会和前任配偶复婚的。

sentences.english: She remarried her former husband ten year after their divorce.
sentences.chinese: 她与原来的丈夫仳离十年后又复婚了。

sentences.english: After Ding Hai went back home, clearly refused to remarry, requires each and all of life.
sentences.chinese: 丁海回家后，明确拒绝复婚，要求各过各的生活。

sentences.english: I do not want to remarry him.
sentences.chinese: 我可不希望到了白发苍苍和他复婚。
